ai-patthana7.14:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in MN 4.)
ai-patthana7.14:1.1_0: The principle doesn’t give rise to the thought. ...
ai-patthana7.14:2.1_0: Taking 36,000 years, four for twenty-four results of deeds, experience only two, three, four, five, ten, twenty, thirty, forty, fifty, a hundred, a thousand, and a hundred thousand.
